function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Idiosyncratic events within a country, such as holidays or backlog in testing laboratories, could generate nonuniform country-wide changes in infection growth for individual days.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Systematic underreporting of infections is a major concern in the ongoing pandemic, which can lead to inaccurate estimates of the true infection rate.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposing assumptions regarding the temporal structure of policy effects","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assuming zero latent period for covid-19 infectiousness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-contamination of medical accessories in factories re-purposed for different products.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospital waste management involving non-biodegradable materials and plastics with potential for disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The construction industry delivering adaptable buildings in record time may lead to a higher risk of disease transmission due to the presence of multiple workers in a confined space.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Refurbishment and renovation activities in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not implemented.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wasteful practices and inadequate sanitation in the food sector contribute to the risk of disease transmission and foodborne illnesses, impacting public health.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased proximity of agricultural activities to urban areas may increase the risk of disease transmission from animals to humans.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased popularity of local farms and urban agriculture due to covid-19 may lead to higher levels of contamination in these settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ramping up the uptake of low emission vehicles and constructing more electric car charging points may increase human interactions within urban environments, potentially contributing to the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Facilitating a step change towards sustainable improvements in air quality may lead to increased construction activities, potentially causing airborne particle pollution and respiratory health risks for urban residents.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrestricted air travel contributing to the spread of pandemics, such as viral influenza types like covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution and transportation/industrialization contributing to critical issues highlighted by the pandemic.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-resilience of peer-to-peer p2p or sharing economy models to global systemic shocks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identifying recommendations for improving operation of the case study facility.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of systematic procedure for developing precautionary measures for covid-19 in sports facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of utilization of post-occupancy evaluation poe for proposed sports club designs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of focus on poe studies in the context of management of health club facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Importance of recording operation, protection measures, signages, and briefings for managing pandemic risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of unified guidelines for sports facilities and practices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Different levels of risk depending on the type of activity individual practice, group activities, competitions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Involvement of non-essential guests during competitions or training sessions increases the risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of staff training and supervision for precautionary measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spacing the equipment at condensed arrangements may not effectively limit physical proximity, leading to increased risk of contagion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding due to reservation system limitations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible publication bias in the study","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High heterogeneity among studies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Late adoption of nphis leading to icu saturation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Difficulty in measuring unique impact of specific nphis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of early nphis such as lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demographic characteristics and population densities impacting the effectiveness of nphis in controlling covid-19 spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited number of studies considering demographic and geographic factors in analyzing the effectiveness of nphis.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the role of health data infrastructures in evaluating nphi effectiveness in pandemics.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Under-reporting of data due to mass panic in low-resource countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability and validity of publicly available data from countries with poor data infrastructure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Observational nature of included studies and lack of clinical trials due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not all studies have used a complete number of possible covariates in the analysis, potentially leading to limited findings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding effect of covid-19 diagnosis testing considerations on outcomes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty of a country’s actual total number of infected individuals due to dependence on testing strategies and number of tests performed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dismissal of contextual factors and merging of intervention results from different countries in the meta-analysis.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative impact of harsh restrictions on the economy and people’s lives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Problems with universal access to vaccines and their effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of nphis effectiveness in different countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fomite transmission of human pathogenic viruses on surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recontamination of surfaces after disinfection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efficacy of technology against specific viruses, such as coronavirus","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of human coronavirus 229e in human lung fibroblast mrc-5 cell line","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enumeration of hcov 229e viral stocks using tcid50 technique","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
